com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer
Class BurstlyAnimatedBanner

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer.BurstlyBaseAd
      com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer.BurstlyAnimatedBanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICacheable
public class BurstlyAnimatedBanner
extends BurstlyBaseAd
implements ICacheable

AnimatedBanner is used to handle the use case of a banner which is not always visible. This type of banner can be hidden and shown. When hideAd and showAd are called they will use the animations provided in setAnims. If no anims are ever set then the banner will pop on and off when hidden and shown.

BurstlyAnimatedBanner

public BurstlyAnimatedBanner(Activity activity,
                             ViewGroup group,
                             ViewGroup.LayoutParams params,
                             String zoneId,
                             String viewName,
                             int refreshRate,
                             boolean autoCache)
Constructs an AnimatedBanner in code and attaches it to a ViewGroup

Parameters:
activity - The Activity associated with this ad
group - The ViewGroup this ad will be attached to
params - The ViewGroup.LayoutParams used to attach an ad to the ViewGroup
zoneId - The zoneId for this banner
viewName - The name of this view which will be used to identify it in teh logs
refreshRate - While the ad is visible the frequency at which it updates. 0 to manually update
autoCache - Do you want the caching of ads automatically managed for you?

Method Detail

setRefreshRate

public void setRefreshRate(int refreshRate)
Set the refresh rate ad interval. For example setRefreshRate(30) sets the refresh rate to update ads every 30 seconds.

Parameters:
refreshRate - int time interval in seconds

public int getRefreshRate()

Returns:

setAnims

public void setAnims(Animation inAnim,
                     Animation outAnim)
Set the animations used to transition the banner on and off screen. If null is used the banner will pop on and off without an animation.

Parameters:
inAnim - Animation triggered by showAd
outAnim - Animation triggered by hideAd

showAd

public void showAd()
Shows an ad. If an ad is already precached it will begin the intro animation immediately. If an ad has not been precached it will wait for the ad to finish loading and then begin the intro animation.

Overrides:
showAd in class BurstlyBaseAd

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
Returns true if the banner is animating onto, displaying on, or animating off of the screen

Returns:
whether the ad is visible or not
